text: If it wasn't for u bitch , me kya hota. You were the one who took my hands and lead me to that magical cleansing warm waters. Soul brother ðŸ’•
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: If theres something i really wished for when I returned to campus this year, it was to make you so high that you forget your own miserable existence. But you outdid yourself, master! I will come to Mumbai, let's eat some bhosda together. ! You were an amazing friend and someone I can count on anytime. Will keep in touch.!
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Bro your smile is so big, bright and infectious. Even though we have only been together on certain occasions, I have never met a guy who laughed just like you. We should meet again. When the next offline Antaragni happens, we should all go there to relive all those moments we missed last year.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Theres nothing more hollow than words. You're someone i can have a long, passionate discussions with. Those conversation and experiences have transcended to places that has never been discovered before. Keep going into places you've never been before. Thats what you've always been good at.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Our friendship started when we first met each other in Hall 7. I hope you remember. But im sure our friendship shall extend beyond the frames of our campus. See you soon.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: I had known you from first semester and we have seen each other a lot in different places but i never talked to you because I was afraid of u chutiye. I was a little intimidated. But now I wonder what for! You were one of the most chill person I know from campus and have a big big heart. I could see you as a Gen Sec even before it happened and you made the decision to compete. It was all so obvious. I still remember the night we met in Antaragni. Will still keep in touch with you bruh.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Jai jai jai it's the most easy name I pronounced out of all the names at campus. It was far too easy working with you. I know how easily frustrated and fucked up a festie can get when things get over his head sometimes. But you were God , you were an animal in that sense. My only sadness is that Antaragni 20 wasn't offline. Lets meet again and maybe visit the next on ground antaragni? And bask in that incredible vibe.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Im still looking for that picture of us. Its been a pleasure to be with you and do some amazing works in Fine Arts Club. Keep stretching your limits Monika ðŸ’•ðŸ’•
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: My man i dont know how to deal with writing this about you. I consider you someone who accompanied me all these years learning new stuff and smoking new stuff in the OAT terrace, D4 and trying and failing in new things at FMC. Those scenes are vividly stored in my memory and I cant take it off now. The only thing that saddens me is that I never had the privilege to trip with you. Then again, that can happen later one day XD
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Extremely enjoyed every moment spend with you in our hall, the basketball court even though it may be a little. Little things are beautiful if u have time to look at. Even tall things like you. :p
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Hey lab mate! Do u know that Ive never passed the 361 lab and I never will have to do it because its getting waivered off finally. So it makes me realize now that all that ive got out of that lab were some good friends like you and not a single word of useful technical education hahaha. But i am happy with what i got! Will keep in touch with you:))
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text:
Yo bitch! Remember that Bet we had? I still think you lost it. When is the treat? 
I hope all your missions in life comes to fruition, you are the techiest person i know from campus. I always thought IITK would be full of people as techy as you, but you are mad about that on another level that no one can match. Stay mad. Stay Techsid.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: You were always the most chill and always the party animal I loved. We have had some incredible memories together when we started meeting in the film club i could see in your eyes my love for films reflected. We really should have made something while we were there. But we have so much time left ahead. And I hope you found the trip we had together a very valuable experience. I have to do more with you, double dose what say?
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Modi what should i say. You were like my big brother in campus. Just that big brother always reminded me of taking care of my acads, doing assignments and taking me to lab with you behind your cycle. I really love what you do and your love for poetry even though i never fully got anything in its entirety. Only thing im sure of ia that you love what you do , so keep that running. And we really have to finish what we left off. See you brother!!
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Bitch this is the moment i realize i never knew your full fucking name.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Shaloooom Nachiketam
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Shalooooooommmm
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text:
"The entropy of a blackhole is proportional to its surface area" 
This should be your pick up line and you'll get laid by some sci fi ass.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: We got close when finally everything was closing down on campus. But the vastness to which our hearts opened and whatever we learned by the end was worth a lot. Hoping to stick by you for many more trips.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: I still have hundreds of your portraits with me. Almost sab me Rishabh bi h .. ill hold on to them and give it to you when we meet the next time. I hope it happens soon XD THANKS for being there for me at DBot and teaching me all those gaalis in Hindi.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Being neighbours for all these years and being batch mates made us strongly connected over the years. Always will remember those namkeens you used to bring from home, those were tasty af. And thode suttas we shared and those trips we had that were totally bonkers XD. You have been there for all the best memories of the campus. This is not a goodbye, we will be in touch!
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Ofcourse here you are Pandey Ji. My first friend from IITK. It was so comfortable and freeing to be with you that day, because I remember being upset about not able to speak in Hindi. Thanks for teaching me those gaalis. Those always came in handy for all the 4 years ðŸ˜‚ .. always stay in touch.!!
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text:
Do u want to know who my puppy love match was? I would prefer not to say. Only because you left me midway in ME647 bsdkðŸ˜¢ 
But leaving that, you have a big heart Ratnesh. Its been a pleasure to be your wingie and batchmate.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: You are the best randi roommate ever. Miss you a lot. I will come meet you the next chance I get. Keep that di*k working! ðŸ’•
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: The greatest lesson IITK taught us all was the value of creating our own culture, our own roadshows and celebrations. And you are an ideal creator. There's something in you that pushes its way outwards as expression in everything you do. Keep purging that creative juices.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Rohan my bhai i still remember that Cat painting you made for freshers. Even though you dont paint enough i cant stress this enough, keep making youll find so much happiness when you take up your brush even in the hardest times. Really enjoyed you as my neighbor and brother all these years. Get that dick working!
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: It was too much fun being your neighbor for all these years. You are a person I respects a lot, and you have a big heart, it doesn't come together often. Also you are the only person i have seen who effortlessly cracks every exam without mugging a lot, in that way you were my academic role model, even if i never matched XD. I hope we will meet again.
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: Im here to state some facts. You are one hell of a performer and I mean it. And I remember you saying to me about your passion for acting. I'll keep that in mind when I start making my first feature film. :P
author: Gowtham  Prakash

text: You cant record voice here. Or i would have recorded myself calling your name, which you always loved! And that T-shirt that you are wearing, i have my eyes on that and my soul XD
author: Gowtham  Prakash
